text: Would I be correct in saying that you can't properly test a memberships setup on a development portal because it requires a connected domain?
as far as I know, yes
Just testing on a sandbox portal too and it seems the same is true there
Can you please define properly testing a bit more?
We're building a memberships heavy website and want to be able to fully test the user journeys for member registration and login without impacting the live CRM

This community thread leads me to believe that I can add a domain to a sandbox portal which would allow the registration email to be sent, to testing that now: <https://community.HubSpot.com/t5/CMS-Development/Sandbox-testing-private-content-membership/td-p/635204>
